import React,{useState}from'react';import{Box,Container,Paper,TextField,Button,Typography,Link,Alert,CircularProgress}from'@mui/material';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{authAPI}from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[formData,setFormData]=useState({email:'',password:''});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{console.log('Login attempt with:',formData);const response=await authAPI.login(formData);console.log('Login response:',response);if(response.data.success){localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(response.data.user));// Redirect based on role
